Talk21:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>The <clr:0000>All-Clucking Cucco <clr:ffff>has been here
giving <clr:0000>prophecies <clr:ffff>today!

I meant to ask if I'm gonna be a horsey
when I grow up...

But it's getting dark, so I guess I better
wait until tomorrow.
Talk47:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Hey, hey! Mister! <sp:5:0:0>Did you come to hear
the <clr:0000>All-Clucking Cucco's prophecies<clr:ffff>?

I came to ask if I'm gonna be a horsey
when I grow up, but...
Talk22:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I wanted to gallop around in the rain,
since horseys don't mind getting wet.

But my big sister says I'll catch a cold...


Maybe I should talk to the <clr:0000>god of horseys<clr:ffff>
at <clr:0000>East Akkala Stable<clr:ffff>. I'll ask him to make
the rain go away!
Talk48:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive>Today I'm going to ask the <clr:0000>All-Clucking
Cucco <clr:ffff>for a <clr:0000>prophecy<clr:ffff>. I need to know if
I'm gonna be a horsey when I grow up!
Gotta hurry!
LargeHorse: I want a ride on that.
Talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If I was a horse, I bet I could talk
to Cuccos!
Talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think_00>I really wanted to talk to the li'l Cucco
who gives prophecies.

I was going to ask if I'm gonna be a
horsey when I grow up.

But it wasn't there. <sp:5:0:0>Weeeird.


<sp:3:0:2:0800>That's OK! I know if I practice, I'll become
a horsey eventually! <sp:5:0:0>Neeeigh!
Talk00:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Neeeigh!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


I'm practicing to be a horsey when
I grow up!
Talk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I got tired galloping around, so it's time
to sleep! <sp:5:0:0>Goodbye.
Talk02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I gotta get home or I'll catch a cold!<sp:5:0:0> You'll
get all wet too if you're not careful!
Talk15:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I wonder what kinds of wishes the <clr:0000>god of
horseys <clr:ffff>can grant?

Can he give horses big, poofy manes?
Or make them all sparkly?

<sp:3:0:2:0500>I know he's at East Akkala Stable, which
you can get to by taking the road <clr:0000>north<clr:ffff>.

But my big sister says it's too far away.


<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>When I become a horsey, I'll be able to
take everyone there! <sp:5:0:0>Clop, clop, clop!
Talk03:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>I'm a horsey, so I like clopping around
in the rain! Brrr! Neigh!<sp:5:1:0>
Talk16: <sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh! Hey, mister! Did you get a prophecy?
Talk04:
<snd:Tired_01><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Neeeigh...<sp:0:2:2:6400>


God of horseys... <sp:5:0:0>Make me a horsey...
Talk05:
<sp:3:0:2:0500>If you take the road north to <clr:0000>East Akkala
Stable<clr:ffff>, you can meet the god of horseys.

I wanted to ask him to turn me into
a horsey.

But my sister said it's too far...


<sp:3:0:2:0800>So I'll just become a horsey on my own!<sp:5:0:0>
Neigh! Clop, clop!
Talk60:
<sp:3:0:2:0500>Since the All-Clucking Cucco is so
popular, the wait is super long.
Talk07:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_00>Welcome to South Akkala Stable, brrr!


Do you like horseys?


I used to like bugs when I was little, but
now I like horseys the best!

<sp:3:0:2:0801>I'm practicing so I can be a horsey when
I grow up! <sp:5:0:0>Neeeigh!
Talk62:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>They say the <clr:0000>All-Clucking Cucco's
prophecies <clr:ffff>are always right!

So I gotta ask if I'm gonna be a horsey
when I grow up.
Talk08:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>The <clr:0000>All-Clucking Cucco <clr:ffff>is here giving
<clr:0000>prophecies <clr:ffff>today!

I can't wait to ask if I'm gonna be a
horsey when I grow up!
Talk51:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Cry>Hey, m-m-mister...<sp:5:0:0> Wh-where'd the
All-Clucking Cucco go?
Talk20:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:SurpriseS_01>Oh, oh! Did you hear?


They say there's a <clr:0000>god of horseys <clr:ffff>on the
road <clr:0000>north <clr:ffff>of here!

<sp:3:0:2:0100>I want to meet him!
